title: Enhancing Peer Leadership and Argumentative Writing Competencies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: As current practitioners, there is a need to cultivate argumentative thinking and digital collaboration skills for job-linked mathematics problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can lead argumentative writing processes as peer leaders in blended learning environments.
Learners can systematically construct and refute mathematical arguments using online/offline collaboration tools.
Learners can enhance the clarity of argument structures, validity of evidence, and logical consistency based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
